page.title: 09FARMING 1
page.content: There are working farms in our area of which we surveyed four. MILK LODGE FARM, JARVIS BROOK. This farm has 120 acres,60 their own the rest rented, owned by Mr & Mrs. White.The main crop is grass for their beef cattle (Hereford cross) & sheep. Once a year all animals have to have a T.B.test before going to the slaughter houses.Tractors are the main machinery OLD LODGE WARREN FARM, ROTHERFIELD This farm is owned by Anketell Jones. His son is manager and his wife keeps the accounts.The farm covers 116 acres for sheep.Besides grass they eat hay and concentrates.Good sheep are sold to slaughter houses,others go to Lewes Market.A tractor with attachments, a mower, fertilizer spreader and sprayer are used.At certain times of the year other machinery is hired.The vet is called for very sick animals.
